name: Emgee Exports
overview:
Inaugurated in the year 1992, we “Emgee Exports, Faridabad”, is emerging as a fast growing company in India in the field of manufacturing, exporting and supplying Cloth Drier, Little Master, Shoes Rack and Step ladder etc.

Our Products : 6 Way Dryer 2 Way Dryer 6 Way & Jumbo Dryer Ceiling Cloth Dryer Wall Mounted Cloth Dryer 4 Way Dryer

Client Satisfaction: Owing to the hard work of our personnel, we have established ourselves strongly in the national market. We are backed by skilled and experienced professionals who are able to offer our wide range of products in compliance with client specifications

Our Team: For efficient working of an organization it is very important to have efficient and hard working team of professionals. Backed by such efficient team of experts we have been able to cater the distinct needs of our clients.

Our Quality Assurance: Being a quality-centric organization, we assure our clients that the products offered by us are fault free and have high strength. In order to design these products, we use excellent quality raw material sourced from the most trusted vendors of the industry.

Why Us ? We are instrumental in manufacturing, exporting, & supplying an outstanding quality range of Cloth Drier, Little Master, Shoes Rack and Step ladder and many more items. The standard of quality, we deliver to the customers and our tireless efforts toward attaining utmost client satisfaction, have raised our demand in the national market.
